project.name: HtmlUnit
project.description: A headless browser intended for use in testing web-based applications.

file.name: .checkstyle
file.content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <fileset-config file-format-version="1.2.0" simple-config="true" sync-formatter="false"> <local-check-config name="HtmlUnit" location="checkstyle.xml" type="project" description="HtmlUnit"> <property name="checkstyle.suppressions.file" value="$${project_loc}/checkstyle_suppressions.xml"/> <additional-data name="protect-config-file" value="false"/> </local-check-config> <fileset name="all" enabled="true" check-config-name="HtmlUnit" local="true"> <file-match-pattern match-pattern="^src/.*\.java$" include-pattern="true"/> <file-match-pattern match-pattern="^src/.*general/huge/.*\.java$" include-pattern="false"/> </fileset> </fileset-config>
